Key Match Events: Jalen Green scored 33 points for the Houston Rockets
Amen Thompson added 23 points and 16 rebounds for the Rockets
Fred VanVleet stole the Lakers' inbounds pass with 5.7 seconds remaining and made one of two free throws
Anthony Davis scored 22 of his 30 points in the second half and grabbed 13 rebounds
LeBron James scored 21 points with 13 rebounds and nine assists but the Lakers couldn't get over the hump
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers trailed by as many as 22 in the first half but stepped up their intensity in the third quarter and cut the deficit to two going into the fourth
Others: The New Orleans Pelicans also played a game on the same day, beating the Wizards, 110-98
